auth.Bot check failed. This may be due to net: Bot check failed. This may be due to network issues or security restrictions. Please reload the page.
auth.Didn’t receive the code? Check your spam: Didn’t receive the code? Check your spam folder, whitelist mail.app.supabase.io, or try logging in if you already have an account.
auth.I confirm that I am 16 years of age or o: I confirm that I am 16 years of age or older
auth.If an account with that information exis: If an account with that information exists, a password reset email has been sent to the account’s email address.
auth.Register or log in to access all feature: Register or log in to access all features
auth.The username you selected was unavailabl: The username you selected was unavailable. You can set a new one in your user profile
auth.This device has saved data from before y: This device has saved data from before you logged in. Would you like to import it? (existing data won’t be overwritten)
auth.We’ve sent a 6-digit verification code t: We’ve sent a 6-digit verification code to:

error.For security purposes, you can only requ: For security purposes, you can only request this after another {seconds} seconds.
error.Invalid or expired code. Please try agai: Invalid or expired code. Please try again.
error.Please verify your email address before: Please verify your email address before signing in.
error.Your verification code has expired or is: Your verification code has expired or is invalid. Please request a new one.

menu.If it doesn’t update momentarily, please: If it doesn’t update momentarily, please try to clear your cache and refresh your browser.
menu.If you encounter problems, use the web v: If you encounter problems, use the web version at
until an app update is ready.
menu.major version(s): {majors, plural, =0 {no major releases} one {one major release} other {# major releases}}
menu.minor version(s): {minors, plural, =0 {no minor versions} one {one minor version} other {# minor versions}}
menu.patch(es): {patches, plural, =0 {no patches} one {one patch} other {# patches}}
This app is {semver} out of date.

migration.Download a backup of your data from befo: Download a backup of your data from before the last update.
migration.The previous data is available to downlo: The previous data is available to export from your profile page.
migration.Your data has been updated to a new form: Your data has been updated to a new format.

notification.Check out the latest updates in the Feat: Check out the latest updates in the Features section!
notification.Scheduled maintenance will occur tonight: Scheduled maintenance will occur tonight at {time}.
notification.Thanks for trying Angular Momentum—your: Thanks for trying Angular Momentum—your modern Angular starter kit!
notification.You successfully tested the notification: You successfully tested the notification system!

page.Enter some text to have it persist betwe: Enter some text to have it persist between page reloads (saved in browser storage)
page.If you find this project helpful and wan: If you find this project helpful and want to see it grow, consider supporting its development. Every contribution (whether through feedback, pull requests, or donations) helps us keep improving.
page.Install Angular Momentum on your device: Install Angular Momentum on your device instead of using it via a web browser:
page.Send predefined notifications to test th: Send predefined notifications to test the system
page.Sends a notification only to your curren: Sends a notification only to your current browser/device. Uses the NotificationService directly.
page.Sends a notification via GraphQL to the: Sends a notification via GraphQL to the server, which broadcasts it to ALL connected clients via WebSocket.
Tauri apps use native OS notifications. Web/PWA uses browser notifications via Service Worker.
page.This project is designed to rapidly spin: This project is designed to rapidly spin up Angular applications within a monorepo with minimal configuration. It comes pre-configured with useful libraries to assist with; translation (i18n, l10n), GraphQL and traditional REST API, websockets, offline storage with IndexedDB, service workers, green test suites (unit and e2e) and much more to help you focus on building your app instead of wasting time on the setup.
page.Turn features on and off for feature fla: Turn features on and off for feature flag testing
page.Unable to load API documentation. Please: Unable to load API documentation. Please check your connection and try again.

privacy.We collect minimal personal information: We collect minimal personal information (email, username, password) to provide authentication services. We do not sell your data. You have the right to access, correct, and delete your data at any time through your profile settings.
privacy.This privacy notice for {companyName} de: This privacy notice for {companyName} describes how and why we might collect, store, use, and/or share your information when you use our services.
privacy.We use cookies for analytics (Google Ana: We use cookies for analytics (Google Analytics, Hotjar) to improve your experience. You can change your preference at any time.
privacy.We use cookies to improve your experienc: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyse site usage.
privacy.We use the following third-party service: We use the following third-party services. Please review their privacy policies:

profile.A verification code will be sent to your: A verification code will be sent to your new email address. You must enter the code to complete the change.
profile.Are you sure you want to delete your acc: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
profile.Download all your account data in JSON f: Download all your account data in JSON format
profile.Permanently delete your account and all: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
profile.Please enter a valid email address: Please enter a valid email address
profile.Remove all stored preferences, notificat: Remove all stored preferences, notifications, and settings. Your account will remain active.
profile.Verification email sent! Please check yo: Verification email sent! Please check your new email address and enter the confirmation code.
profile.Without a username, your profile is priv: Without a username, your profile is private

time.in minutes: {count, plural, one {in one minute} other {in # minutes}}
time.minutes ago: {count, plural, one {one minute ago} other {# minutes ago}}

update.This is a major update and requires rest: This is a major update and requires restart
update.This is a minor update and requires rest: This is a minor update and requires restart
update.This is a small change—you can update la: This is a small change—you can update later if desired.

validation.8+ characters with 1 uppercase, 1 lowerc: 8+ characters with 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, 1 symbol
validation.Most Unicode characters allowed (emojis,: Most Unicode characters allowed (emojis, accents, etc.)
